programs.title: Python
programs.subtext: My first programming language, I started messing around with Python when I was about 16, before my bachelor studies.

programs.title: Java
programs.subtext: Learned object oriented Java in my first year of college. I've mostly used this for school projects.

programs.title: C#
programs.subtext: Started learning C# last semester when we had a .NET development class, I want to get deeper into it and use it to make games in Unity.

programs.title: Web
programs.subtext: Expereince with HTML, CSS & JS. Also React & Express which this website is built on. I learned HTML, CSS & JS in school and thaught myself React & JS.

programs.title: Nodejs
programs.subtext: I've been getting into Node and I've had fun learning the basics, it's certainly something I want to learn more about and use for more projects.

projects.title: Personal website
projects.subtext: The website you're on right now! Made using React & Express JS. Was a bit of work to learn React, Express and also how to deploy a website.

projects.title: Unity game
projects.subtext: I am making my own game with Unity this summer to see if making games is something I like. If it is I'll be making more.
